description: St. CatherineGÇÖs Rehabilitation Hospital provides medical care with rehabilitation services for those suffering from neurological and orthopedic disabilities caused by stroke, spinal cord or head injuries, diseases such as MS, ParkinsonGÇÖs Disease and Muscular Dystrophy, amputation and lower extremity fractures, arthritis/osteoporosis and chronic or acute pain, both in the hospital and via outpatient clinic services. name: VILLA MARIA NURSING & REHAB CENTER, INC.
